content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my swing in my back yard at about 10 pm, and i was talking on the phone. about 5 minutes after my phonecall ended, i was just relaxing on the swing when an orange glimmer caught my eye. slowly the orange star-like object became bigger and bigger and then it stopped. it was about as big and bright as the north star but it was orange colored and brighter. i was looking at it wondering if it was a planet, or a meteor, but then it started to slightly wabble from side to side. then two similar orbs of the same color and brightness split from the single entity and now there were three. they stood still for several seconds, then the the one on the left and right of the main light started to slightly wabble as the first one did. in the blink of an eye, the right one moved inhumanly fast to the right and dissappeared and and maybe 3 seconds later the left one went to the left, just as fast and dissappeared. the middle light then started bobbing up and down and then moved just as fast as the other two straight up and dissappeared. ive tried to think of something to explain what i saw, but nothing came to mind. 

thanks for your time,
*(wit's first name deleted -- cms/sg).
content.summary: Three bright orange lights that were very high up in the sky and were moving in a very unexplainable way

content.detailedDescription: When i reviewed it today....I did not notice it there when i took the picture.  i tried emailing the picture to you earlier but when i hit "submit" it said there was a virus and that the picture would not be sent.  i scanned the pic with ms security essentials and malwarebytes and there is no virus.  hope it comes thru as this is a good picture, original is 9.51 mb
content.summary: I noticed what appears to be a ufo in the picture

content.detailedDescription: I left work and started driving home on the state highway. there were thunderstorms in the distance, about 5 miles away. i have to take several back roads to get to my house, and so i pulled onto one of those. it was a few minutes past 9pm. as i was driving at about 55mph i noticed a dark object with flashing lights on my left. at first i thought it was a plane, or maybe a helicopter, as i see them flying over fairly often, mostly during the day time. but as i stared at it i realized it was unlike any craft i had ever seen. it had blue, red, and white flashing lights that flashed on a ring around the craft. it was lower to the ground than any plane would fly, and was coming at me at a perpendicular angle. i still thought it was some sort of plane until it turned, very sharply, to parallel the road. as soon as i saw the back of the craft i knew it wasn't a plane. it looked more like some sort of space shuttle. there were three yellow circles on the back of the craft arranged in a triangular fashion, much like the thrusters on the back of a space shuttle. the circles were not that bright and i could still see the white and red lights flashing from the back of the craft. it looked like it had two large wings, but the exact shape was hard to tell because the only source of light (other than the craft) were a flash of lighting or two. at this point i realized just how fast this thing was moving. in the span of less than a minute it was just a pinprick in the distance.
content.summary: I was driving home from work and looked up to see a strange craft in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,

i am in the army and would like to report a ufo sighting.
it has taken me a while to report this. the only reason i am doing it now is that i am watching a documentary on ufos and it reminded me of what myself and someone else saw.

i saw this ufo twice in 2009, in the autumn. it was the day that president bush was speaking at ft campbell, ky and we were driving home.

 it was in the evening after 9 pm.
the sighting lasted perhaps 5 seconds both times, in both dyer, tn, and outside maury city tn.  with the sighting in dyer, there was someone with me, that was also a witness.

the closest i can describe the craft is that it looked like the outline of the craft in district 9. i only figured this out later when i had seen the movie.  the craft passed just above tree level it seemed, and was lighted as such so you could see full detail, with a rather orange lighting that shone from several different areas that iluminated the shape of the underside. there was no sound that i could detect.

i told the guys in the office at the time, and have mentioned it to a few people but have never officially reported it until now.

you may contact me at *(wit's phone number and email address removed--cms/sg). i cant imagine that we were the only people that saw this. it really was something.

sincerely,

**(wit's name deleted -- cms/sg).
content.summary: Ufo sighting in crockett and gibson county tn

content.detailedDescription: I got this from my friend that went to vegas and and took a picture out the hotel window and he did not even see it untill i look at the pictures that he posted on facebook and there it was, now this could be a plane or something elese i don't now and he did not know eather. maybe yall now more about this than we do. thank you
content.summary: Don't now

content.detailedDescription: I was in my room with my girlfriend and daughter. i started to look out the window to check out the weather. all of a sudden a shiny object caught my eye. i decided to keep looking at it. i stared  at it for about five minutes and then i showed it to my girlfriend. we stared at it for about a minute or so.  i asked my girlfriend to keep an eye on it while i went to the car to get the camera. i came back, and it was still there. i took three pictures of the object. the object came from the north and went south. it moved very slowly, then it stopped for a bit. then it continued going south. and i lost track of it.
content.summary: I was looking out the window and a shiny object caught my eye.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the back yard with my dog and saw a red flashing light which is usually a plane then when i turned my head i saw a bright moving star like object moving at a fast speed with no sound, when i called my son to look we went to the front of the house for a better look but it had gone.
content.summary: Bangor  uk

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting outside on our patio on 4/25/11 at 9:52pm when we saw a rectangular shaped object that caught our attention as it appeared in the distance and soar silently from southeast to northwest. it is difficult to estimate the size or how high it was. the view was unobstructed.The object could be seen clearly and it was not rotating, making noise or illuminated. my wife believes it was roughly 200��� x 200��� and was flying at roughly 1500���. i believe it was much larger and was flying closer to 1 mile. the object appeared to be in a liquid state, such as the chemical mercury, but it retained its parallelogram shape throughout the sighting. it appeared to only be reflecting the lights from the ground, and had no lights on the craft itself. the object had a "digital" camouflage appearance of a circuit board or other layered pattern. it was dark outside with few clouds and the stars were shining brightly. the object made no noise and flew in a straight line and was faster than any aircraft i have ever personally seen. we live in an area with little surrounding lights from our community. neither my wife nor myself have ever seen anything like this and have never witnessed any unidentified object.
content.summary: Parallelogram shaped object with no lights but reflective qualities soared silently overhead

content.detailedDescription:
Aparecio detras del avila a las 5:53 am, tardo aproximadamente 2 minutos en cruzar el cielo desde el avila hasta el donde la vista daba. se tomo en la urb. el marques el sabado 27/2/10 por mi persona, direccion diagonal norte-este. el objeto era una luz blanca intensa, siempre del mismo color, sin otras luces, puede ser esferica o lenticular, su velocidad es mayor a la de un avion, que he visto en infinidad de oportunidades, sabiendo distinguir bien entre aviones, avionetas y helicopteros pues he visto cotidianamente desde el mismo punto de observacion a estos pasar durante a���os. en el segundo 32 se puede ver como sube de intencidad, luego redujo la velocidad y se fue perdiendo de vista por el amanecer y el alejamiento, sin emitir sonido alguno. el video fue tomado con una telefono celular nokia n82 en resolucion alta y exposicion predeterminada

1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
i just arrived to my home (5:15 am aprox) and were some friends drinking in front of my home, then i stay with them drinking and talking 
2. what made you first notice the object?
i always watch the sky because this is not the first time i see object in the sky
3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
an ufo! so very different of an airplane, same fly height of they
4. describe the object and its actions and motions.
white light circle, constant, same direction
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
when i saw this light i ran to take my nokia n82 in the bag (i had a blackberry in the pocket but nokia have 4mpx resolution camera in video, so much better quality)remenber that i just arrive to my home and i not opened the door yet, my stuffs been outside
6. how did you lose sight of the object?
when fly away and my home block the view (sorry for my english)

please watch the edited video in youtube (only audio, i put music because in the original one can hear obscene words in background)*(link moved to additional evidence section--cm/sg).
i upload it the same day. 
edited video on my nokia n82
content.summary: Volo por encima de nuestras cabezas sin ningun sonido al amanecer de ese dia

content.detailedDescription: It was 227pm apr 27 i went outside to smoke cig with my dad and he looked up and pointed and said what is that is that a ufo? i looked and said ya weird what is that. it was going left and was like a frisby and the few was like the side of a friby in flight few. it had some black window looking things it appeared to be rotating like a fan. it went left real fast. then weirdly it dead stopped for 20-30 seconds. it was silver. it was at least size of football field. just by the size i saw there it was bigger than any other airplane the us has made. then after stoped went back left and tree blocked it off and should have came back in view but it was like gone.I was calm at first then i thought about it for seconde got scared,like something odd happened, anxiety. it was gone at 229 i looked at the clock then when it went behind tree i went grab camera it reaed 229. crazy stuff. i will take polograph swear on a bible. it was not a plane. the only time i saw something like this was on ufo shows. thanks it was ufo and i am not crazy. i live in engelwood. rotanda west, fl.
content.summary: I went to smoke cig with dad out poarch he pointed to an object. at least a football field silver appeared rotating and silver metallic and stoped

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside, smoking cigarette (disgusting..I know) looked up at the sky and saw two large objects that looked like parachutes. however as they got closer, i realized, the objects were moving like a caterpillar/worm.These object are in worm shape, but would tend to retract, expand, and go in sphere shape, then back to worm form.The color was extremely bright, the hue of the glow which could perfectly be seen even during daylight, consisted of red,orangey/yellow and bright white. so i retrieved my phone and recorded. just like any cellphone recording or picture, is nothing like seeing it in person. so, i recorded until the past out of sight,but then came a  group spread out. this group consisted of 6-8 of them. this small fleet behaved the same as the previous two, however i also noticed, a small bright silvery "orb" floating around a few of them, as if it was keeping them in check.The orb move much faster than the worms. i has recorder on while the group passed,however the file of course can not be opened.(still working on trying to open file)continued to watch as they too faded past my apartment and out of sight. once again i stopped recording, and then came two more, that were a bit spread out with single orb seeming to just watch the "worms". so started recording back up again. this time, thank god! i had a neighbor who was outside, and i brought it to his attention, to make sure i was not just hallucinating!He confirmed he too has never seen anything like it. continued to record, as we tried jokingly suggesting it was some unfortunate clown who may have lost his balloons. the objects did indeed float gracefully like a balloon!!
please someone can you explain this! i have tried to be "logical" in my thoughts, by telling myself there is a simple explanation. however, i am certain this is not the arch balloons or the parachute streamers as other websites have suggested.I would just like to know did any one else get a view of this. i have been searching non-stop. this is west hollywood, someone else had to see this. i mean come on...We have griffith observatory right in the city. they have to know!
p.S: thought this information maybe important, in the first sighting, there was a by-plane that did fly close to the objects, that is what made me think they could be skydivers. also, in between the small break up of when i seen the first two and before the small group was in sight, there also was a helicopter and another by plane that fly past. no way they could not have seen this.
content.summary: Pulsating, shapshifting worm like objects in sky!

content.detailedDescription: I watched a white unsteady object in the sky, then i saw another one, they blinked one would dissappear, and go into the other one, then come out, and repeat this again. i called my husband, and son and they also saw this happenning. they eventually dissappeared. this lasted for at least 15 to 20 minutes.I kind of always know where to see them.I called my husband and son to makesure that i was not mistaken. i slept good.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watched in sky one object, and another one blink and go into each one.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend was driving up his road to get to his house and he like to take pictures of the sky. he took 2 pictures that night. this one, is the first and the second one, you see the sunset he took 3 seconds later. it was not until later that there was something in the picture that seemed to look like what is classified as a ufo. i have always seen ufos on tv in specials and whatnot, but this, was creepy. he didn't get to see where it was going or what it actually looked like cause it was going so fast and he was driving. i had him send it to me though my phone and then sent it to my computer via email and i sharpened it it see the details. all i can say is that i never realized that they were this close to us.
content.summary: Crain hill road ufo

content.detailedDescription: I didn't notice these at all when i took the picture. it was only after i ws home looking through the pics that i noticed this.  it looks to me like there are a few objects in the sky & possibly some on the mountain side. this was taken somewhere on chief joseph highway in wyoming. i would be interested in other opinions about what these are.
content.summary: Didn't notice numerous objects until viewing pic at home

content.detailedDescription:
Yesterday i submitted a detailed report on a sighting of three ufos by myself, my parents and my sister on 17-sep-1957 near lockport (niagara county), ny.

when the second form came up for providing additional information, i did my best to provide the information sought.

however, i now realize i incorrectly answered the queries regarding whether or not each of the witnesses wore eyeglasses.

although we all wore eyeglasses later in life, at the time of the sighting (17-sep-1957), none of us (my father, my mother, my sister and me) wore eyeglasses.
content.summary: Three circular white luminous ufos; jet planes searching for the ufos; one jet chased one of the ufos

content.detailedDescription: My friend was laying on the bed of histruck one summer night talking with his friends (who were standing up and chatting/smoking) then he said suddenly,above the treeline,he saw a very big object passing by (from east to west) in an amazing speed yet completely silent. he screamed to his friends "did you see that?? did you see that??" his friends asked "see what?" he replied "the ufo.Big,huge,silver color, like the underbelly of an airplane but very wide,oval shaped". his friends laughed at him saying "oh,yeah,and et stuck his hand out and waved goodbye". he told me "nobody believes me.They think i imagined it,but i swear i saw it.I am not scared of anything,but that was a supernatural feeling that truly frightened me" he told me that back in 1995,so i said "well...Who knows" and in 2008 in the very same town (stephenville,texas) people claimed to have seen a ufo.
content.summary: Friend sighting of ufo in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was walking on texas tech campus returning to my dorm, and a jet that wasn't commercial from markings / light pattern and wing span / size, past overhead really low. i never have seen anything like this all year i've been here and it made me look up. when i did, no more than 2-3000 yards away this blue light dropped out of the sky, went from looking like a simple star to growing and getting brighter, then it flashed eastward to follow and overtake the jet. as soon as it did it was gone on the horizon and the jet banked off to follow it. the entire sighting couldn't have been more than 5 seconds at best. i was on the phone with my best friend when it happened. my adrenaline was pumping upon seeing it and all my hairs stood up on the back of my neck. i didn't hear anything but the wind and the jet, and i didn't get any sort of emp effect on anything i owned or that was in sight. however when i called the campus police the receptionist on the phone also told me that he himself had seen it on his way into the shift,but assumed it was part of the plane from his point of view. sadly he hadn't yet gotten any other reports.
content.summary: Bright blue light, about the size of the north star from perspective.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving and spotted a huge glowing orb of light hovering over the blue bridge in kennewick wasington where i live, i watched it hover for 10 minutes and then fly across the river and land in someones yard, i started my car and drove across the bridge to go find where it landed, by the time i got over there it had gone back up and started sitting hovering above the bridge again, i stayed where i was though watching it, finally it started moving right towards my car, i got to see that it was a triangle shape and very large in size, it was quiet and made no type of noise.  i have seen this same ufo on three occasions now, and am curious to why they are in my city.
content.summary: Kennewick

content.detailedDescription: Every night last summer a few friends and myself would hang out at a local park late into the night. one night midway through july, we decided it was getting late and we should head to one of the girl's house a block away. we had reached the corner of the block that the playground was on when all of us suddenly stopped. we were surrounded in an almost perfect rectangle of green flashing lights, and they almost seemed to pulse. they were moving around us, and i remember feeling like they were targeting us, almost as if they were tracking our location and movements so we could be captured without injury. there were at least three of us standing on that corner, and at the same time (after about two minutes beneath the lights) we all screamed and started running like we had never run the last block to the safe refuge of our friend's house. when we got there, we all compared how we experienced it and found that all of us felt the same things-like they were targeting us, and we all noticed that when the lights passed over our flip-flop exposed toes, we felt a strange warmth coming from them that was uncharacteristic of a still summer evening. not to mention that this heat was focused solely on the patch that it covered, and the heat vanished the second it moved. another thing we all remembered was that when we looked up in unison, we saw no source for the lights. this meant that there was no possible way they had been from a plane or jet, because we obviously would have seen and heard it. looking back on the memories only moments later, we all agreed that when we had started to run, the lights flew away in opposite directions and disappeared after mere seconds. pulsing lights that targeted a bunch of pre-teens that had no visible source? i can't speak for you, but i don't consider that a coincidence.
content.summary: At least four green flashing lights with no source
Leah awoke at 4:45 am on april 24, 2011,  and looked out her window to see a succession of five orbs.

content.detailedDescription:
At about 7:30 p.M. on 17-sep-1957 my father, my mother, my sister (then age 7) and i (then age 9) were riding in the family automobile on south transit road in the town of lockport (niagara county), ny, a short distance south of the city of lockport.  we were driving south on transit road to go to the nearby tastee freeze frozen custard stand.  my father was driving, my mother was in the front seat on the passenger side, my sister was in the back seat on the passenger side and i was in the back seat on the driver's side.

all of a sudden out of the corner of my eye i caught sight of an unusual object descending in the western sky towards the horizon at a very rapid rate.  the descent path was at angle to the vertical.  just before the object would have reached the horizon, there was a brilliant flash and the object then rapidly moved back up in the sky away from the horizon, in an ascent path that was a mirror image of the descent path.  the angle between the descent path and the ascent path was about 30 degrees.  the event was as if the object had bounced off a point in space.

as soon as i observed the object and the flash, i got my sister to trade places with me in the back seat so i could get a better view through the passenger side rear window.  my dad pulled the car over to the side of the road so the four of us could watch the object.

the object was circular in shape.  the object���s size was about the same as that of an eraser of a yellow wooden school pencil held at arm���s length.  the object was white, luminous and bright, but not shiny.  the object���s appearance was very much like if one could cut a circle of appropriate size from the glowing white light emitted by a fluorescent light bulb.  the edges of the circle were distinct, not fuzzy.  the object had no markings, wings or other appendages of any kind.  there was no indication of structure.  there were no vapors, smoke or trails.

from the apparent size of the fighter jets that later appeared (see below), i would guess the object was a few miles from us (a few miles to the west of us), although i am neither skilled nor trained in making distance estimates.

the flash was very brilliant.  based on my observations of burning magnesium in later years, i would say the brilliance was at least as great as that of a magnesium flare.  the duration of the flash was short (less than a second).

after we pulled over to the side of the road, i and my parents and sister became aware of two additional objects in the western sky of identical appearance to that of the first object.  i can���t say if the other two objects suddenly appeared after the flash, or if we simply became aware of the other two objects.  i can say that there were three separate objects, all of the same appearance.

there was no sound associated with any of the objects and no sound associated with the flash.

after the flash the three objects moved about in the sky at slow speed, in all (seemingly random) directions.  they moved independently, not as a group, changing their relative positions over time.  they moved with no particular pattern or direction.  sometimes one or more of the objects appeared to be stationary in the sky.

about five to ten minutes after i first saw the first object, about five or six military jet airplanes arrived in the area.  my guess would be that they were air force or air national guard fighter jets from the nearby base in niagara falls, ny.  the movement of the jets indicated to me that the pilots of the jets were looking for something.  they were in the general area of the three objects.  the jets appeared to be fairly close to us, each appearing about a half to three-quarters of an inch long were one to hold a ruler at arm���s length (thus indicating to me that the jets and the objects were perhaps a few miles to the west of us).  the jets were far enough away that we couldn���t hear the sound of their engines.

after the jets were in the area for a few minutes, one of the jets suddenly moved southward directly towards one of the objects (presumably in pursuit of the object).  as soon as the jet started moving towards the object, the object immediately moved away from the jet at a very high rate of speed, at least an order of magnitude faster than the jet.  the jet appeared to lose track of the object and after a while the jets left the area.

dad, mom, my sister and i observed the three objects for a total of about 60 to 90 minutes.  the objects slowly moved towards the southwest and slowly moved upward in the sky.  in order that we could continue observing the objects, dad drove our car towards the southwest over secondary roads west of transit road.  if i remember correctly, this included crossing by bridge over the erie canal, although i can���t be sure.

as time passed the three objects slowly moved (seemingly drifted) towards the southwest and higher in the sky, and daylight diminished.  we eventually lost sight of the objects.

several days later dad submitted a written report on our sighting to the national investigations committee on aerial phenomena (nicap), an organization to which dad already belonged and to which i would later also belong.

an article about my dad in the 4-jan-1958 edition of the lockport union-sun & journal newspaper included comments by dad on ufos and on our 17-sep-1957 sighting.

i can tell you with certainty that the objects we observed on 17-sep-1957 were not airplanes, helicopters, weather balloons, any other kinds of balloons, birds, reflections, mirages, unusual meteorological phenomena, stars, planets, the moon, comets, meteors, asteroids or any other kind of astronomical objects.

my sighting of the three objects is something that i will never, ever forget.

can you tell me if anyone else ever reported the objects that dad, mom, my sister and i observed on 17-sep-1957?

there were three other occasions when i saw an unusual object in the sky.  the first case was later in the 1950s or in the early 1960s.  my father, my mother, my sister and i observed an object while we were parked on church street in the city of lockport one evening.  the object was stationary in the sky.  i don���t remember much about this, except that when i looked at the object through binoculars it appeared to be spherical.  i don���t remember the object���s coloring.  my best guess is that the object likely was a weather balloon or something similar.

the second occasion remains much stronger in my memory.  this sighting occurred in the 1980s when i worked at at&t bell laboratories on the east side of columbus, ohio and lived in delaware, ohio to the north of columbus.  it was about 5:00 p.M. and i was driving north on the eastern portion of i-270, the interstate loop that encircles columbus.  when i was near the southeast corner of the columbus airport i observed to my left (west) a fairly large cigar shaped object sitting low in the sky (but high enough that i could see it above houses and trees).  one���s immediate reaction would be that this was simply a blimp (like the goodyear blimp) at the airport.  however, several things make me still wonder about the object:  (1) the cigar shaped object was definitely brown in color, not gray.  my understanding is that blimps are usually gray in color.  (2) as soon as i saw the object, i immediately thought to myself that this object was ���a million years old���.  this is perhaps an unusual thought to occur when observing an aerial object.  (3) i did not pull over to the side of the highway to better observe the object, but rather kept on driving.  this may have been because of heavy traffic, but i remember thinking that someone didn���t want me to continue looking at the object.

because i kept on driving, i observed the object for only a short time (perhaps a minute).  certainly it could have been a brown blimp, but i���ve always felt i saw something unusual that day and i���ve always remembered my thinking that the object was a million years old.

the third occasion was in the late 1990s.  my wife and i were passengers on a bus taking carolina hurricanes hockey fans from raleigh, nc to a game in greensboro, nc.  we were traveling west on i-40 in the afternoon.  my wife and i both saw a very unusual object in the sky to the south, through the windows on the left side of the bus.  we watched the object for several minutes.  we immediately recognized that the object was very unusual but (strangely) didn���t pay much attention to details.  i remembering we discussed whether or not the object was following my wife and me.  i don���t remember much about the object, other than it was fairly large and easily visible, that it was not a balloon, airplane or helicopter, and that it was stationary in the sky.

at the risk of sounding like a crackpot or sounding like someone who is mentally imbalanced (neither of which i am), i should mention that there have been several events in my past that i find troubling.  i���ll provide details on two of these events.

one event was when i was visiting with my mother in lockport in the 1980s.  at the time i lived and worked in erie, pennsylvania.  one evening i took mom out for a ride in my car.  i drove to the area in the town of lockport where we had seen the three ufos in 1957.  for some reason i parked on the side of one of the secondary roads we followed on 17-sep-1957, i suppose to think about our sighting many decades earlier.  i remember a niagara county sheriff���s department deputy stopping to ask if we were ok.

the other event occurred when i was a child, either before or after the sighting of 17-sep-1957.  one time i and some of my friends rode our bicycles southward on beattie ave in the city of lockport to the intersection with robinson road in the town of lockport.  robinson road runs east-west.  at the time there was a fenced field (farm land?) on the south side of robinson road.  i remember that i and my friends rode there to look for evidence of a ufo landing in the field.  i also remember that we went over the fence to look around in the field and that we found indentations in the field that we took to be physical evidence of a ufo landing in the field.  i and my friends going to the field definitely occurred.  i don���t know whether or not something of significance occurred in that field previously.

if i were given the opportunity to undergo hypnotic regression to refresh my memories of these and other events, i would welcome such opportunity.

by profession i am a software engineer, although i am currently unemployed.  i graduated second in my class in high school.  i graduated from rensselaer polytechnic institute (rpi) in troy, ny with a b.S. in electrical engineering in 1970 and in 1991 i earned a masters degree in computing and information science from case western reserve university (cwru) of cleveland, oh.  i���ve worked as a telecommunications engineer, systems engineer and software engineer for general telephone company of pennsylvania (gte), itt corporation, at&t bell laboratories, bell northern research (bnr)/northern telecom/nortel networks and corona networks.

my parents are now deceased.  my sister is still living; she lives with her husband and children in lockport.

if you have any questions, please feel free to contact me.
content.summary: Three circular white luminous ufos; air force jets searching for them; one jet chased one of the ufos

content.detailedDescription:
At around 10:45 pm i was standing on my patio looking north-west towards orland ca. (i have used google earth to identify cardinal directions of the various objects). i saw what appeared to be a star, low to the horizon and just above the roofline of a house across the street, with a subtle red blinking/twinkling emanating from it. i watched the object because the light looks somewhat artificial, but it was a very subtle difference between the stars and the object i was observing. after a few seconds fixing my viewpoint to a roof line and a fence slat to make sure it was the object moving and not me projecting my own slight head movements to the object. the object began moving slowly west, then suddenly changed direction and moved very smoothly to the east. it then did some short zig-zag motions that looked very odd and convinced me i was seeing a ufo and not a plane or helicopter or various other normal phenomenon. 

at this point i went inside, grabbed a friend and drug her outside to get a corroborating witness. she clearly saw what i was seeing. i made a couple of phone calls to family who live about 20 miles to the eat in the foothills and let them know the event was happening. i then got my camcorder and got in the car with my friend. we drove north on highway 32/nord ave. for about 1 mile, and turned left on to muir ave. there was a large field on the left, and orchard on the right. we parked along the orchard and got out, and were immediately able to spot the star-like ufo making slow, subtle movements in irregular patterns about 45-60 degrees above the horizon to the north-west. we watched it for several minutes, and then i noticed another one to the west at approximately the same position relative to the horizon. 

the objects were both moving in very strange fashion. they would slowly move in any direction for short distances, they would halt, stutter forward, bob up and down and weave about in very short spurts. the movement was odd to witness. i would describe the bobbing movements as close to what a fishing-bobber lure looks like when riding small waves or ripples. it was very fluid and quick at times, and then slow and more deliberate at others. 

after turning around and facing the field on the other side of the road, i began scanning the skies for other bright star-like objects. they became immediately apparent now that i had an idea of which "stars" to focus on. i mainly was able to identify them at a glance by their brighter light. i counted six of them in the period of 10 minutes, and noticed at least one more after watching for over half an hour, making the total seen and observed at seven. there easily could have been more, but it was hard to focus on one or two, let alone follow seven of them. 

i should mention that the two almost directly above me looked yellow/amber in color, while the bright one to the north-east i spent most of my time watching was a white/blue color, much like the color of the north star, but with a slight tinge of blue. this particular object did some fantastic "dancing" in the sky, making zig-zag patterns, bouncing, zipping downwards and upwards, and all kinds of various fun movements. at one point, it "dimmed" its light very quickly and then brought them back on. 

i tried recording for a good while with my camcorder (actually my friends camcorder, and neither of us could do anything with the settings but hit "record" due to both of us being unfamiliar with what settings to use on the camera in dark conditions). i placed the camcorder on the roof of the car and rested it towards the lowest-flying ufo that was a few degrees above the south-eastern treeline. it was white with red twinkling. (note: i looked at the video, and on my monitor, it just looks black. i do not think there was enough light for the camera to pick up the objects, though i would be interested to know if there is image processing that can be done to see very dim objects.)

i made several phone calls to people, including my sister, who stepped outside and immediately saw the objects moving about. she drove out to where i was, and we watched them together. i phoned another friend who also went outside with her husband and saw them. the current total witness tally is 5 people.

we left the field to go home at approximately 12:15-12:30 am. all of the observed ufo's were still in the sky and in the same relative fixed areas they stayed in the whole time. 

at 2:30am i could see a ufo out my window as i fell asleep. i watched it for ten or fifteen minutes. it stayed between two fixed stars, and it would move upwards and downwards in slow, smooth motions, and would sometimes do small zig zags much like a a glowing fly or a lightning bug. very strange to watch the movements, as they do not resemble any sort of known aerial object i have ever seen before. 

to sum it up:

1. the objects looked like bright stars, had subtle color variations, and moved in ways not possible with known aerial craft or phenomenon. 

2. they were in the sky in fixed areas (like they had there own "sections" they had to stay in) for over three hours during the period i observed them. they were there at 2:45am when i finally fell asleep. 

3. no sound was audible. 

4. multiple witnesses saw them from multiple vantage points.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Seven + star-like ufo's bobbing and weaving around the sky

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out side to smoke a cigertte cuz i didnt smoke in the house took probley 3 puffs off my cigertte and looked up and saw this huge triangle with  huge lights on each corner and one right in the middle i opened the door and was yelling at my girl friend to come see and she was to scared to even look by the tone of my voice i guess and it was moving from west to east real slow looked like it should have fell out the sky and it made no noise what so ever and iam not sure on the date but i do know that it was,april or may i believe it was and the time of night was about right it made the hair on the back of my neck stand up wish i would have had my camara but i didnt and i couldnt take my eyes off of it i could even see structure of the craft it looked like the triangles i have seen on the internet i have also seen other objects through my life proubley about 9 or so for many years iam 46 years old and ive seen stuff as far back as a teen and most recent ones was up in charlevoix county seen two sightings up there in a 5 year spand also seen a cigar shaped ufo when i was leaving work going from charlevoix to central lake michigan it was a very cloudy night and the clouds where low and soon as i was leaving the city of charlevoix i saw a cigar shaped object drop below the clouds with about 6 windows or so and the light that was coming out of those windows was real bright and it made no noise either dropped out of the clouds for about 20 seconds or so then it went back up into the clouds and that was back in  summer 2006 i think
content.summary: Triangle flew over the house real slow with no noise barley above the trees

content.detailedDescription: Estaba en el patio de mi casa a eso de las 7:30 pm. cuando de pronto divise en el cielo como a 400 mts de altura >< una luz blanca como de 20 metros de diametro que venia sentido del mar caribe en las costa de moron, hacia las monta������as de moron, no tube tiempo de tomar fotos, ya que me quede como paralizado y alcanse a llamar a mi esposa que vio cuando pasaba por las nubes y desaparecia.
content.summary: Luz blanca redonda 20 mts. dim.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard facing west my friend noticed it and shouted look so i did and i was kinda freaked out before this i never seen anything capable of such speeds an silence at the same time it was extraordinary to say the least. it headed from north north west to south east towards san diego straight across the sky no flashing no sound an really really fast and it was low it was around id say 50000 feet the only reason we saw it was because some stars flashed and caught are attention that's when we noticed it was moving across the sky
content.summary: Headed from north north west to south east towards san diego across sky no flashing no sound an really really fast

content.detailedDescription:
This happened the day before detroit hosted the mlb all-star game at comerica park in 200?
 i walked out onto our back deck to have a cigarette and saw in the sky three round things in a triangle formation not too far away and not very high up in the sky. it was late afternoon but there was no sun reflection from these craft. they were silvery grey in color but not shiney.
 i called my wife to the deck so she could see it too. i wanted to run inside and get my camcorder but i did'nt want to miss anything so i stayed on the deck.
 soon the orbs started slowly moving and formed a straight line when out of nowhere a larger oval shaped craft appeared. it's rear opend up and all three orbs slowly loaded inside of it. the rear end closed and it started to slowly move ( maybe 50') and poof-it just disappeared. it did'nt fly off it looked like it just flicked a switch and disappeared.
 the next day we had a b-2 bomber fly overhead and circled back towards comerica park (for the all star game opening ceremonies). it flew in the same path that the round crafts were at the previous day.
content.summary: Three small round craft load into larger oval craft

content.detailedDescription:
Our neaghbor had said that he had seen a ufo the night before but we didnt answer the door when he knocked. tonight he knocked on the door and we came outside to the road in front of our house in dora alabam. in the sw sky there was what looked at first glance to be a star with multiple color flashing lights. i had grabbed binoculars and my mother, her friend, our neaghbor and his wife, and myself all took turns looking at the shape in the sky. it changed shape several times. when i say changed shapes it could have been turning. it looked at first like the head of an arrow, then like a diamond, then like it was taking off (it got smaller and had traces of light around it, like it was moving away but didnt go anywhere) then it looked like a sideways jellyfish. it had a very bright white light. it also flashed yellow, blue, green, and red. the white lights were constant. it had what looked like an orange light hanging behind and underneath. it was small in the sky like it was far away but a plane passed and it looked lower to earth than the plane.
my family went inside for a moment. before i went in i watched it for awile and it got smaller and moved like it was dancing sort of. i went inside and drew out what i had seen. i grabbed the binoculars and went back outside. it was no longer in the same spot. it had moved through the sky about a mile north.( i didnt see it move i just spotted it further away.) i saw its shape fairly well before it just vanished. i had tracked the nanosail-d to see if that was what i was looking at, but at that time it was over australia. i could not find a satellite to track that was over the area at that time. thanks for listening.
*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Ufo over dora alabama, changes shape then vanishes.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the us army reserves in the 1990's.  one night, around june 1, 1992, while on my annual training exercise, i was in the woods, many miles from the nearest town, but amongst thousands of us & canadian army reservists on a base called gagetown, new brunswick, canada. i was dropped off a mile or two from camp, to guard an ammunition dump in a clearing of about 100 yards by 150-200 yards, surrounded by tall trees. the moon was full and the sky was clear.

at 11:20pm, i had the chilling sensation someone had snuck up on me and was standing next to me, looking at me.  it sent a slight chill through me.  i looked up to the right and there, about 100-or-so yards past the treeline, an enormous craft arose in the vicinity of a small lake/pond.  i could see it plain as day and knew immediately it was an alien space craft. 

it rose like a helicopter and flew slowly, like a helicopter, yet it was silent and lacked distinctive characteristics of both a helicopter and airplane, like a tailfin, wings, propellers, or safety lights.

in the bright moonlight, i could clearly see the entire craft, which was longer than a 747 or c-130, possibly oval or round, and tapered towards the tail. there were three sets of lights in a 120 degree arc around the front of the craft, which appeared to be windows, but may have been headlights. 

i was paralyzed with fright and tried not to move, lest be seen. i slowly turned my head to watch the craft pass by.  i watched it until it had gradually disappeared over the treeline. 

after it had passed, i could hear the faint static-like sound of a jet-type engine, however the craft moved far too slowly to be a jet and the sound was barely audible, unlike a jet. there were no runways, where it took off - it had to come out of the lake or another clearing past the trees. having seen many helicopters throughout my training, and ridden in them, i can say without equivocation this was no helicopter. with the bright moonlight, there is no doubt in my mind this was neither a commercial nor military craft known to the public, even now, nearly 20 years later.

another soldier was on post about 1/4 mile away at another ammo dump. we had agreed beforehand to pick up our field phones at 11:30 to make sure we were both awake. our exact conversation went: me,"hey, you there?" him, "yeah" me, "did you see that?" him, "thank god you said that!" we had both seen the same thing, described the same thing to each other, and agreed we had both seen an alien space craft.

this incident was never reported to the military because our fellow reservists thought it was a joke we had both concocted and we eventually dropped it. but to this day, i shudder when i think of it.

i did report this on another website and was shocked to see the year after i posted it, a canadian soldier posted an eerily similar account on the same night.
content.summary: Army training exercise

content.detailedDescription:
This is in response to the report titled "strange plane with green lights dropping balls of lights to ground" i think i have a video of the object you described. i've been seeing them a lot in my area for the past few months. 

here is a link to the video
*(link moved to additional evidence section -- cms/sg)

you can see the green lighting pattern best around 1:45. the craft was flying only a few hundred feet in the air and was going very slow. if you watch the video in slow motion at 1 minute 41 seconds in the video you'll see a faint ball of light dropping to the left of the aircraft. it happens rather quickly so you might have to watch it a few times to catch it.
content.summary: Video of strange plane with weird green lighting

content.detailedDescription:
Object flew from se to nnw about the speed of a fast airplane.  i first thought i was seeing a bird flapping its wings, but the speed and trajectory clearly were too straight and the light that at first seemed like the underside of a bird's wing clearly became more of a metallic glint.

as it was near sunset (about one hour before), the "light" appeared like a dark-colored metallic object that flashed to bright (whitish color), but not so bright that it seemed any more than the sun's reflected light.

the rate of the "on-off" of the light/reflection seemed to be about 4-5 times per second.

the speed and altitude, as subjectively compared to the many airplanes that overfly my house (i am 20 miles from a regional airport), was 15 thousand feet or so, no noise or contrail, about 500-700 knots (faster than all but military aircraft at that altitude in this area).

the size was smaller than a regional aircraft, such as a canadair jet often seen in the area, perhaps 1/2 the size and from my viewpoint (southwest of the object which was about 40 degrees above the horizon) the object's side profile was saucer or cigar-shaped.  

this was the first time i have ever seem an object that i could not explain.

i was outside watching my children jumping on a trampoline.  i was not on the trampoline and the children did not see the object, nor did i point it out to them, as my viewing frame was only about 5-10 seconds long before it passed my view due to being blocked by trees.
content.summary: Saw object at approx. 15-20k ft. metallic and flashing like reflected light of sunset
